name: Knights Treasure
description:
Knight Treasure is amazing adventure game, help our Knight find the way to go home by pass all levels in this game. Knight has to collect the diamond, the door will open. Collect the coin on road to unlock more character. Player can view Rewarded Video to earn more coins.

Knight Treasure now have 10 levels, we’ll update more levels, you can easily add more level and custom the parameters of game, make this game more attractive.
